amendment.description: To add the provisions of the Armed Forces Tax Fairness Act of 2003.

vote.text: Amendment SA 661 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 661 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S6451-6456) To add the provisions of the Armed Forces Tax Fairness Act of 2003.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 661 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 661 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator McCain.
